metadata.name: RadGod Custom #1
metadata.description:
One of a limited selection of ERC-721 tokens to be sold in a fundraising auction to buy me an iPad.

The winner of this auction can request that a custom Legendary Radbro be created on the iPad, created in the image of any fiction or non-fiction character that the winner chooses.

This token's current artwork and metadata are placeholders, and will be updated once the custom request has been completed.
